summary: We here in the Scalzi household don’t typically give too many gifts to each other at Christmas — we have enough stuff — although we’re happy to give them to others, because it’s fun and shows an appreciation for having them in your life.  One of the people that we give gifts to is Charlie […]
title: Happy Charliemas

summary: My Mom loved the holidays.  She always tried to do too much, and would get a little frazzled and stressed, but she did it because she loved all of it
title: Joyful, joyful

summary: A quick recap of our Christmas Eve and Christmas Day
title: Christmas 2024

summary:
Santa at Tyrol 
Last year, my brother and I decided to start our own little Christmas tradition: Julbord (Swedish Christmas buffet) at a place called Tyrol, known for its fantastic atmosphere and great variety of good food. 
We had a wonderful time this year as well. 
We're not particularly fond of the usual Christmas mania with opening presents and so on...
title: Honesty is the Best Gift

summary: Wherever you are, I hope you had the holiday you wanted and a time to enjoy whatever you enjoy.  Merry Christmas from Wonder Woman and I
title: My Holiday Was Pretty Good, How Was Yours?
